components.description: Schwinn Super Butted 'N'Litened' Gold label TIG welded aluminum with Schwinn cyclocross geometry, IS standard head tube, forged dropouts w/ replaceable hanger, 2x H2O bottle boss
Shimano Tiagra STI w/ Tektro bar top levers
Shimano Tiagra 34.9 down-pull (F), Shimano 105 silver SS (R)
Xero CXR 330 wheel set with aero double wall rim, 28 holes front and 32 holes rear
